titles.title: A bill to terminate the application of certain provisions relating to the McColl Site in Fullerton, California.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to Subcommittee on Transportation, Tourism, and Hazardous Materials.

bill.summary: 7/8/1987--Introduced. Removes any restrictions on the use of Superfund funds for the transfer or disposal of hazardous waste from the McColl site, Fullerton, California.
